mail.RID, mail.USERNAME, mail.GROUPNAME, mail.IP, mail.SERV_CRC, mail.APP_CRC, mail.LOG_TIME, mail.CONTENT, mail.TITLE, mail.MAIL_FROM, mail.MAIL_TO, mail.CREATTIME, mail.CONTENTPATH, mail.RECORDSTATE
mapper.select: select ,crc1.CRC_VALUE as TRANS_SERV_CRC,crc2.CRC_VALUE as TRANS_APP_CRC from SMMS_AC_MAIL as mail left join smms_crc_mapting as crc1 on mail.SERV_CRC = crc1.CRC_KEY left join smms_crc_mapting as crc2 on mail.APP_CRC = crc2.CRC_KEY where mail.RID = #{RID} and mail.RECORDSTATE='0' and (crc1.CRC_TYPE='a' or crc1.CRC_TYPE ='r' or crc1.CRC_TYPE ='t') and (crc2.CRC_TYPE='a' or crc2.CRC_TYPE ='r' or crc2.CRC_TYPE ='t')
select CONTENTPATH from SMMS_AC_MAIL as mail where mail.RID = #{RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_AC_MAIL set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.insert: insert into SMMS_AC_MAIL ( RID, USERNAME, GROUPNAME, IP, SERV_CRC, APP_CRC, LOG_TIME, CONTENT, TITLE, MAIL_FROM, MAIL_TO, CREATTIME, CONTENTPATH, RECORDSTATE) values ( #{RID}, #{USERNAME}, #{GROUPNAME}, #{IP}, #{SERV_CRC}, #{APP_CRC}, #{LOG_TIME}, #{CONTENT}, #{TITLE}, #{MAIL_FROM}, #{MAIL_TO}, #{CREATTIME}, #{CONTENTPATH}, #{RECORDSTATE})
